mapper.select: SELECT t.EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, t.EMAIL_TYPE, t.EMAIL_SUBJECT AS subjectTemplate, t.EMAIL_TEMPLATE AS bodyTemplate FROM SMC.SMC_EMAIL_TEMPLATE t WHERE t.EMAIL_TYPE = #{emailType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SMC.SMC_EMAIL ( USER_SSO, TO_ADDRESS, CC_ADDRESS, BCC_ADDRESS, EMAIL_BODY, EMAIL_SUBJECT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, IS_PROCESSED ) VALUES ( #{email.sso}, #{email.toAddress}, #{email.ccAddress}, #{email.bccAddress}, #{email.body}, #{email.subject}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{email.sso}, 'N' )

INSERT INTO SMC.SMC_EMAIL_DOCS ( EMAIL_AUDIT_ID, DOC_NAME, DOC_TYPE, DAS_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES
( #{document.emailAuditId}, #{document.documentName}, #{document.documentType}, #{document.dasId}, #{creatorSso}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
